#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    long int n,queries;
    scanf("%ld",&n);
    long int arr[100000]={0};
    scanf("%ld",&queries);
    while(queries--)
    {
        char ch[10];
        scanf("%s",ch);
        if(ch[0]=='U')
        {
            long int i,amt;
            scanf("%ld%ld",&i,&amt);
            for(long int j=i;j<=n;j=j+i)
                arr[j]+=amt;
        }
        else
        {
            int v;
            scanf("%ld",&v);
            printf("%ld\n",arr[v]);
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
